column2: "Hm? It's Peon! Hey Peon! You look troubled. Are you troubled? I can help you know."
"I see. You can count on me whenever you need help. I'll be right there!"
"Of course! Huey and Peon will be fussing over me if I mope around, after all."
"I've been thinking about what I should do. I've been thinking a lot."
"I've done so much thinking. But in the end, I can't figure out what I should do."
"Well, I can't do what I don't know. So I've decided to do what I can do."
"I want to help everyone, people like Huey, and Peon."
"Some people haven't forgiven me, and others run away from me... and I don't blame them."
"But if I let that stop me, I'll be the same as I was. So I'll keep looking ahead, not behind!"
"What, were you worried? I'm fine, really!"
"I mean, Huey and Peon have forgiven me, right?"
"With the two of you here for me, I have nothing to fear!"
